PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-08742019-06-19,  ,  PCH,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of LISE BERNIER of Saguenay, Quebec, to be a member of the Board of Directors of the National Capital Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective June 22, 2019, in the place of Basil Stewart, whose term will expire.
